pychell API reference¶

RV Models¶

class pychell.orbits.rvmodels.CompositeGPRVModel(data=None, planets_dict=None, noise_process=None, poly_order=0, time_zero=None, name='rvs')¶

Bases: pychell.orbits.rvmodels.CompositeRVModel, optimize.models.GPBasedModel

Base constructor for a noise based model.

Parameters

  • det_model (DeterministicModel) – The deterministic model.

  • noise_process (NoiseProcess) – The noise process.

  • data (Dataset) – The dataset for this model.

  • name (str) – The name of this model.

compute_data_errors(pars, include_corr_error=False)¶

Default method to generate the data errors, which may be parametrized. Here the data a priori error bars are returned.

Parameters

pars (Parameters) – The parameters.

Returns

The data errors.

Return type

np.ndarray

compute_residuals(pars)¶

Default method to generate the residuals (data - model).

Parameters

pars (Parameters) – The parameters.

Returns

The residuals.

Return type

np.ndarray

Bases: optimize.models.DeterministicModel

Base constructor for a model.

Parameters

build_planet(pars, t, planet_index)¶

Builds a keplerian model for a single planet.

Parameters

  • pars (Parameters) – The parameters.

  • t (np.ndarray) – The times.

  • planet_dict (dict) – The planet dictionary.

Returns

The RV model for this planet.

Return type

np.ndarray

build_planets(pars, t)¶

Builds a model including all planets.

Parameters

  • t (np.ndarray) – The times.

  • pars (Parameters) – The parameters.

Returns

The RV model for this planet

Return type

np.ndarray

static planet_signal(t, per, tp, ecc, w, k)¶

Computes the RV signal of one planet for a given time vector.

Parameters

  • t (np.ndarray) – The times in units of per.

  • k (float) – The RV semi-amplitude.

  • per (float) – The period of the orbit in units of t.

  • tc (float) – The time of conjunction.

  • ecc (float) – The eccentricity of the bounded orbit.

  • w (float) – The angle of periastron

  • tp (float) – The time of perisatron

Returns

The rv signal for this planet.

Return type

np.ndarray
